messages.title: Not ALL crooks!
messages.content: A former Redbridge Tory & Independent Councillor was jailed last month for soliciting a 10,000-pound bribe to support a planning application. Meantime over £600,000 of MP expenses – Cohen has had to make a humble payback to local Labour for her wrongly spent claim and Parry remains totally apologetic to Parliament and local voters.

messages.title: Higher Costs and Fewer Cops - Thank you Boris!
messages.content: Although the London Mayor proposes to freeze his Council Tax precept, he doesn’t mention he’s reducing the block grant to boroughs leading to increase in local council taxes.

messages.title: Wanstead Swimming Pool – Progress!
messages.content: Redbridge Council have agreed to investigate construction of a temporary pool in the Warren Hall.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Bikes in the Park - report back
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems focus on cycling policies involves allowing bicycles on your view on our electoral chances! Wanstead Park.
Asking for help with information regarding a knife incident involving two young men near Lake House Road.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only the Lib Dems can beat Labour in Leyton & Wanstead.

issues.environment: The future of Wanstead Park is under consideration with the aim to restore the park to its former levels.

housing.content: Progress on Wanstead Swimming Pool – Redbridge Council have agreed to investigate construction of a temporary pool in the Warren Hall.

images.caption: Wanstead Liberal Democrats Focus - Your Local Newsletter
